items.title: Transfer request from teen starlet stuns Bar√ßa
items.summary: Barcelona have been left stunned after teenager Dro Fern√°ndez informed the club of his desire to leave this January by exercising his ‚Ç¨6 million ($7m) release clause, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: USMNT's Sargent banished to Norwich U21s
items.summary: Norwich City manager Philippe Clement revealed that USMNT striker Josh Sargent has been sent to play with the club's under-21s following his refusal to take part in last weekend's FA Cup match against Walsall.

items.title: Senegal demand 'equal treatment' for AFCON final
items.summary: The Senegalese Football Federation filed a formal complaint ahead of Sunday's Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco, citing a failure to provide adequate security, accommodation, training facilities, and fair ticket allocations.

items.title: Demb√©l√© scores stunning lob in PSG win over Lille
items.summary: Ousmane Demb√©l√© put transfer talk behind him and scored a crucial brace for Paris Saint-Germain in a 3-0 win over Lille that returned it to the top of Ligue 1 on Friday.

items.title: 'Nix is like a dog on a leash' - Schecter on why Bills have hope at Broncos
items.summary: Denver Broncos quarterback Bo Nix still needing to be manipulated like "a dog on a leash" gives Josh Allen hope of extending the Buffalo Bills' playoff run, according to Phoebe Schecter.

items.title: De Jong lovend over uitblinker Baouf na cruciale zege bij ADO
items.summary: Cambuur deed vrijdagavond uitstekende zaken in de Keuken Kampioen Divisie. De Friezen wonnen de eerste wedstrijd van het kalenderjaar, nota bene op bezoek bij koploper ADO Den Haag. Na afloop wilde trainer Henk de Jong het maar wat graag hebben over een uitblinker in zijn ploeg.

items.title: Van Persie laat zijn licht schijnen op Sparta: 'We zullen getest worden'
items.summary: Feyenoord hoopt zijn eerste zege van 2026 zondag te boeken, thuis tegen Sparta Rotterdam. Robin van Persie, trainer van de club uit Rotterdam-Zuid, verwacht geen makkelijke middag tegen de Kasteelheren .

items.title: Uitvallen Nederlandse doelman blijkt begin van rampavond voor Club Brugge
items.summary: De eerste voetbalweek van 2026 werd een inktzwarte voor Club Brugge. De Vlaamse topclub werd midweeks in de beker uitgeschakeld door Charleroi, vrijdagavond gaf het thuis een 2-0 voorsprong helemaal weg tegen La Louvi√®re: 2-3. Tot overmaat van ramp viel Dani van den Heuvel geblesseerd uit.

items.title: Former Man Utd players' comments 'irrelevant' - Carrick
items.summary: Michael Carrick brands the noise generated around Manchester United by former players "irrelevant" and says Roy Keane's personal comments did not bother him.

items.title: Frank must beware ghost of Tottenham managers past to avoid Nuno‚Äôs fate
items.summary: Manager aware his reign has parallels to the Spurs spell of his counterpart at West Ham, Saturday‚Äôs visitors When Thomas Frank glances along the touchline at Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo on Saturday afternoon, he will see more than the ghost of Tottenham managers past. Because during his darkest hours ‚Äì and there have been a few of those during a fraught first season at the club ‚Äì he may also see a vision of his own future. The parallels between the two are clear and they are difficult to ignore as Nuno makes his return to Spurs with West Ham, desperate for a result to help lift the club out of the relegation places. When Nuno went to Spurs in 2021, he did so as a manager who had made his name in English football with Wolves, getting them promoted from the Championship and going on to enjoy success with them in the top division. Ditto Frank with Brentford before his move to Spurs last summer. Continue reading...

items.title: Premier League news: Arteta welcomes throw-in coach, Moyes defends Barry
items.summary: News from Friday‚Äôs press conferences, including updates on Arsenal, Nottingham Forest and West Ham Continue reading...

items.title: Historic moment! Sergio Perez drives first ever Cadillac car at Silverstone
items.summary: A historic moment for Cadillac as Sergio Perez drives their first ever car at Silverstone.

items.title: Magnifieke Demb√©l√© gidst PSG naar (tijdelijke) Franse koppositie
items.summary: Paris Saint-Germain heeft vrijdagavond geen misstap begaan in de Franse titelstrijd. In eigen huis was de topclub te sterk voor Lille en daarvoor mochten de bedankjes naar Ousmane Demb√©l√©. Vooral de tweede treffer van de sterspeler was onwaarschijnlijk mooi. Eerder op de avond zonk AS Monaco verder weg in de eigen moeilijkheden.

items.title: Miovski hat-trick helps Rangers beat fourth-tier Annan in Scottish Cup
items.summary: Rangers are safely through to the fifth round of the Scottish Cup after a routine 5-0 victory over fourth-tier Annan Athletic at Ibrox.

items.title: Roma-aanwinst Malen bespreekt het Colosseum en vriendschap met Kluivert
items.summary: Donyell Malen was nog nooit in Rome geweest, maar is maar wat blij dat hij voortaan speler van AS Roma is. De Italianen maakten zijn transfer vrijdag wereldkundig, en Malen stond het clubkanaal op zijn eerste werkdag meteen te woord.

items.title: Van Gerwen wins Bahrain title as Littler's 21-match winning run is ended
items.summary: Michael van Gerwen won the Dutch derby against Gian van Veen to win the Bahrain Darts Masters as Luke Littler's 21-match winning run came to an end.

items.title: No cups, no Europe, 40 matches: is this Manchester United‚Äôs post-Ferguson nadir?
items.summary: As Michael Carrick prepares for Saturday‚Äôs derby, fans wonder if this is the club‚Äôs worst moment ‚Äì but they are spoilt for choice Manchester United, without a permanent head coach or European football and knocked out of both domestic cups at the first time of asking, are facing another bleak season. In the almost 13 years since Sir Alex Ferguson left, the club have struggled to find stability, with his shadow stretching down from the directors‚Äô box to the dugout, emphasised by the stand named in his honour staring back. Manchester City arrive at Old Trafford on Saturday in the opposite position, having had Pep Guardiola in post for a decade, amassing 18 major trophies. Michael Carrick will take charge of United for the first time since being appointed until the end of the season at a club who appear to be without a functioning long-term plan. This will be a campaign of only 40 competitive games for United, their fewest since 1914-15, with some fans thankful for being able to cut down on trudging visits. So is this, in the post-Ferguson era, the lowest of the lows? Continue reading...

items.title: The dramatic 24 hours that sealed Guehi and Glasner's futures
items.summary: BBC Sport looks at a dramatic 24 hours for Crystal Palace as captain Marc Guehi agrees to join Manchester City and manager Oliver Glasner confirms he is leaving in the summer.

items.title: 'No panic buy' - Guehi would cap ¬£414m rebuild as Man City up title ante
items.summary: Manchester City have upped the ante in the Premier League title race by flexing their muscles in the January transfer window.

items.title: Oliver Glasner‚Äôs inevitable exit compounds one of Crystal Palace‚Äôs worst ever weeks | Ed Aarons
items.summary: Manager‚Äôs decision is no surprise having fought to keep Marc Gu√©hi in the summer and amid doubts over futures of a host of Palace‚Äôs FA Cup-winning stars It was the day Crystal Palace supporters had dreaded but feared was inevitable. Oliver Glasner, having confirmed that the captain Marc Gu√©hi‚Äôs move to Manchester City is poised to go ahead, had another bombshell prepared for his press conference to preview Saturday‚Äôs trip to Sunderland. Nearly eight months to the day since the Austrian led the club to their first major trophy by beating Manchester City in the FA Cup final, his announcement that he will leave Selhurst Park at the end of the season came as no surprise. It rounds off one of the worst weeks in the club‚Äôs history after the humiliating defeat by non-league Macclesfield that will be for ever an unwanted postscript to their victory. Continue reading...
